Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Spleen Harvester.
{2}, Sacrifice another creature: Create a Food token. If that creature had mana value 2 or greater, create two of those tokens instead. [i](It's an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]

When Strombo enters the battlefield, create a Food token for each creature card in your graveyard. [i](It's an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
{T}, Sacrifice a Food and a non-Food permanent: Search your library for a permanent card, reveal it, and put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Vigilance
When Cloud Nomad enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Those without homes to call their own received invitations to Strombo's grand banquet as whispers in the wind.[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Sump Gumpie enters the battlefield, return another permanent you control to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Gumpies live deep within the marsh, but can always sense when a merchant passes by with something particularly shiny.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever you cast a permanent spell, you may exile target permanent that shares a card type with it, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

cards.rules_text: When Sable Seer enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. If you control an Aura attached to a permanent an opponent controls, you may put any number of those cards into your graveyard instead.

At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top two cards of your library, then reveal a card from among them. If it's an Aura card, you may put it onto the battlefield attached to a creature an opponent controls. If you don't, put it into your hand.
